text: bulsinjadeul-i geudeul simjung-e mu jisidaeui wiseonjeog-in oman-eul gajyeoss-euna hananim-eun geubun-ui seonjijawa mid neun jadeul wie pyeong-an-eul naelyeojusigo geudeullo hayeogeum uiloun malsseum-eul jun suke hayeoss-euni igeos-eun geudeul-i bad eul gwonliyo gachiyeoss-euni sillo hana nim-eun modeun geos-eul asim-eulo chungmanha sinila
